Html: I'm wondering if there is a version optimized to run on a HD TV??? R the reason I'm asking is i cant see alot of option in the menu bars and i cant see the advanc3ed search options when I click on it they are covered up by the other surrounding options like gear and the search buttons. Plus the Hands and trinket are line wrapping to start and calm. I hope this is helpful.

The resolution that I use on my TV is the same as my laptop's native.  I don't notice any problems.  Please write up an issue, and include screen shots including DPI levels and actual resolution that you are using on your TV.
